tasks.title: Introduce Markdown renderer into ChatWidget assistant messages
tasks.description: Wrap assistant responses with a Markdown rendering component that supports GFM, syntax highlighting, and scoped styling without affecting user bubbles.
acceptance: Assistant messages render Markdown elements (code blocks, inline code, lists, emphasis, links).
Code blocks display one-dark syntax highlighting with copy button.

tasks.title: Scope Markdown styles to chat assistant bubble
tasks.description: Add chat-specific wrappers or classes so prose typography applies only inside assistant responses and remains responsive on mobile.
acceptance: Markdown styles are contained within assistant bubble wrapper.
Layouts and spacing unchanged for user/system messages.
Dark mode verified for code blocks and links.

tasks.title: Optimize streaming rendering performance
tasks.description: Ensure incremental Markdown parsing during streaming does not cause jitter; optionally throttle renders or reuse memoized component state.
acceptance: Streaming responses display progressively without layout thrash.
Large code blocks remain scrollable within bubble.

tasks.title: QA & regression checklist
tasks.description: Execute the QA checklist defined in PRD (Markdown coverage, streaming, mobile, sources/followups).
acceptance: QA checklist items validated and documented.
No regressions found in chat persistence or follow-up buttons.

notes: Keep copy button mobile-friendly; consider future table support if needed.
